message.body: Any dates you can't go this summer. We need to get a house not many left.
I should know for sure tomorrow

Be sure to let me know today of there are any dates you cannot go this summer. Talked to Lindsay last night and she said the house in Carlsbad would probably be best and she can probably get pack and plays.
I will probably need to be in Denver august 5th. So probably best if it doesn't but right up against that. If it does I can make it work I'm sure
Yeah pretty open. Do you have any rough idea of weeks you are looking at?
July14-Aug 4. It depends on when the house is available. I'm going to talk with dad tonight so he can email the owners
